Class ProjectManager

java.lang.Object
controller.project.ProjectManager
public class ProjectManager extends Object
Manages BTO projects, including creation, retrieval, updates, and deletion. Handles project eligibility checks for applicants, flat allocation, and loading initial project data. Interacts with ProjectRepository, ApplicantManager, ManagerManager, and OfficerManager.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public static String createProject(String projectTitle, String neighbourhood, LocalDate applicationOpeningDate, LocalDate applicationClosingDate, Integer twoRoomFlatAvailable, Integer threeRoomFlatAvailable, Double twoRoomFlatPrice, Double threeRoomFlatPrice, String managerNRIC, List<String> officerIDs, Boolean visibility) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new project, automatically generating a unique project ID. Checks for overlapping project timelines for the assigned manager before creation.
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - The title of the project.
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood where the project is located.
      applicationOpeningDate - The date when applications open.
      applicationClosingDate - The date when applications close.
      twoRoomFlatAvailable - The number of available 2-room flats.
      threeRoomFlatAvailable - The number of available 3-room flats.
      twoRoomFlatPrice - The price of a 2-room flat.
      threeRoomFlatPrice - The price of a 3-room flat.
      managerNRIC - The NRIC of the manager responsible for the project.
      officerIDs - A list of NRICs of officers assigned to the project.
      visibility - Whether the project is visible to applicants.
      Returns:
      The generated unique ID for the newly created project.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If the manager has another project with overlapping application dates.

    • createProject

      public static void createProject(String projectID, String projectTitle, String neighbourhood, LocalDate applicationOpeningDate, LocalDate applicationClosingDate, Integer twoRoomFlatAvailable, Integer threeRoomFlatAvailable, Double twoRoomFlatPrice, Double threeRoomFlatPrice, String managerNRIC, List<String> officerIDs, Boolean visibility) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new project with a specified project ID. Checks for overlapping project timelines for the assigned manager before creation.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The unique ID for the project.
      projectTitle - The title of the project.
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood where the project is located.
      applicationOpeningDate - The date when applications open.
      applicationClosingDate - The date when applications close.
      twoRoomFlatAvailable - The number of available 2-room flats.
      threeRoomFlatAvailable - The number of available 3-room flats.
      twoRoomFlatPrice - The price of a 2-room flat.
      threeRoomFlatPrice - The price of a 3-room flat.
      managerNRIC - The NRIC of the manager responsible for the project.
      officerIDs - A list of NRICs of officers assigned to the project.
      visibility - Whether the project is visible to applicants.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If a project with the same ID already exists or if the manager has overlapping projects.

    • viewAllProject

      public static List<Project> viewAllProject()
      Retrieves a list of all projects from the repository, regardless of visibility or dates.
      Returns:
      A list of all Project objects.

    • viewVisibleProjects

      public static List<Project> viewVisibleProjects()
      Retrieves a list of all projects that are currently marked as visible.
      Returns:
      A list of visible Project objects.

    • updateProject

      public static void updateProject(String projectID, String projectTitle, String neighbourhood, LocalDate applicationOpeningDate, LocalDate applicationClosingDate, Integer twoRoomFlatAvailable, Integer threeRoomFlatAvailable, Double twoRoomFlatPrice, Double threeRoomFlatPrice, String managerNRIC, List<String> officerIDs, Boolean visibility) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException, ModelNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project to update.
      projectTitle - The new title.
      neighbourhood - The new neighbourhood.
      applicationOpeningDate - The new application opening date.
      applicationClosingDate - The new application closing date.
      twoRoomFlatAvailable - The new count of available 2-room flats.
      threeRoomFlatAvailable - The new count of available 3-room flats.
      twoRoomFlatPrice - The new price for 2-room flats.
      threeRoomFlatPrice - The new price for 3-room flats.
      managerNRIC - The new manager's NRIC.
      officerIDs - The new list of officer NRICs.
      visibility - The new visibility status.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the project with the specified ID is not found.
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - Potentially thrown by the underlying repository update mechanism, though less common on update.

    • viewApplicantEligibleProjects

      public static List<Project> viewApplicantEligibleProjects(String applicantNRIC)
      Retrieves a list of projects that are currently open for application and visible. Does not filter based on applicant eligibility criteria (like marital status). TODO: Enhance this method or create a new one to fully check applicant eligibility.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - The NRIC of the applicant (currently unused in filtering logic but kept for potential future use).
      Returns:
      A list of Project objects open for application.

    • removeFlat

      public static void removeFlat(String projectID, RoomType flatType) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Decrements the count of available flats of a specific type for a given project. Used when a flat is allocated or booked.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project.
      flatType - The type of flat (RoomType.TWO_ROOM_FLAT or RoomType.THREE_ROOM_FLAT).
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the project with the specified ID is not found.

    • addFlat

      public static void addFlat(String projectID, RoomType flatType) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Increments the count of available flats of a specific type for a given project. Used when a booking is rejected or withdrawn.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project.
      flatType - The type of flat (RoomType.TWO_ROOM_FLAT or RoomType.THREE_ROOM_FLAT).
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the project with the specified ID is not found.

    • getByID

      public static Project getByID(String projectID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Retrieves a project by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Project object.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If no project with the specified ID is found.

    • addOfficerToProject

      public static Boolean addOfficerToProject(String projectID, String officerID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Adds an officer to a project's list of assigned officers. Checks if the officer is already assigned before adding.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project.
      officerID - The NRIC of the officer to add.
      Returns:
      true if the officer was successfully added, false if the officer was already assigned or if project/officer ID is null.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the project with the specified ID is not found.

    • getAvailableProject

      public static List<Project> getAvailableProject(String applicantNRIC) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of projects available for application by a specific applicant. Filters based on project visibility, application dates, applicant's marital status (for 2-room flats), and ensures the applicant is not the manager or an officer for the project.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - The NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of Project objects the applicant is eligible to apply for.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the applicant with the specified NRIC is not found.

    • repositoryIsEmpty

      public static boolean repositoryIsEmpty()
      Checks if the project repository is empty.
      Returns:
      true if no projects are stored, false otherwise.

    • loadProjects

      public static void loadProjects()
      Loads initial project data from a CSV file (ProjectList.csv). Parses project details, dates, manager, and officers, then creates project objects. Handles potential parsing errors.

    • getAllProjects

      public static List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves a list of all projects currently in the repository. Alias for viewAllProject().
      Returns:
      A list of all Project objects.

    • deleteProject

      public static void deleteProject(String projectID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Deletes a project from the repository.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project to delete.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the project with the specified ID is not found.
